Senior Technical Recruiter, Talent Acquisition, Amazon Seller Services at Amazon

Supported the build of a world-class organization for Amazon and hiring the best in their fields to continue creating amazing new products and features! identified and networked with passionate people who thrive on creating the best user experience possible and a desire to have a substantial impact on millions of global users.

I was responsible for leading the talent acquisition function, supporting the corporate site & Pet360 E-commerce organization (Infrastructure Services, Web and Application Technology, Marketing, Merchandising, Distribution, Fulfillment, Pricing logistics & Customer Support Service Center). I provided strategic direction for Sr. leaders in the midst of critical transformation. I developed strong and positive relationships to improve workforce planning while partnering with company Leadership (EVP, SVP, VP, and Directors) to fill critical hiring needs.
Recruitment Relationship Manager, Allegis Global Solutions for American Express

I was responsible for the overall daily management of all open positions for the Technologies Digital Transformation department and responsible for driving the results of the team. I was a talent advisor to the hiring leaders from Team Leaders to Vice Presidents. This included the client relationships, driving the recruitment processes including sourcing strategies, managing the progress of the job searches, the candidate experience, data management and all the related administrative duties. This was accomplished through the leadership of a dedicated team of Client Recruitment Specialists, Talent Assessors, and Recruitment Coordinators.

Responsible for full life-cycle IT recruitment in a fast pace, high volume hiring environment.   CDI IT Solutions is a division of CDI (NYSE:CDI), a $1.1 billion leading provider of engineering and information technology outsourcing solutions and professional staffing. We provide information technology consulting, project outsourcing and staffing to optimize a client’s IT infrastructure, reduce overall IT costs, improve service levels and free up capital for strategic investments.
Alpha Epsilon Pi Social Fraternity, Gamma Beta Phi Honor Society, Arizona State University Greek Internal Fraternity Council, TRIO Services,

Received a Bachelor of Arts in Communication. Minored in Film. Achieved Dean’s List: four semesters. Received Arizona State University 2003 Sun Star Award for positive contributions to the ASU community, leadership and being a role model to other Sun Devils through both service and academics. Coordinated social, educational and fund raising events for Alpha Epsilon Pi social fraternity. Held various leadership positions, including president in 2001. Created marketing programs resulting in an increase in membership. Received Alpha Epsilon Pi National Fraternity Lion Award for outstanding Delegation.1999- Alternative Spring Break-volunteer work, built homes in Mexico 2000- Pima Reservation school teacher intern.2000- Birth Right participant: international travel to Israel2002- Hillel Teaching Scholar: Developed lessons and produced curriculum for fifth graders. 2002- TRIO: Scholarship recipient for maintaining 3.3 GPA     2003- President of ASU Chabad Alumni Association.

summary: Solution-focused and result driven Talent Management professional with a proven ability to exceed staff fulfillment, employee and client value goals. Twelve plus years of experience in providing full life cycle recruitment practices, process improvement, and compliance management. Highly experienced in creating recruiting initiatives, while delivering tactful and strategic performance in fast-paced and challenging work environments. Currently the Sr. Technical Recruiter for Seller Services at Amazon, and actively, placing best talent available to repeat similar success.Specialties: Recruiting initiatives, Profit growth, Strategic planning, Team building, Staff management, Quality management, Relationship building, Efficiency improvement, Project management, Vendor management, Employment referral management, Sourcing, Job posting, Ad placement, Behavioral interviewing techniques, and High volume recruitment.Amazon’s business is growing at a massive rate! A significant and ongoing increase in sellers offering products on our platform and enhancing selection for customers is part of the reason for this growth. The result is an opportunity for Seller Support to work on challenges related to scale. Seller Support solves complex challenges and this requires new approaches. We want our people to think long term and try new things. We have the opportunity to obtain functional knowledge across multiple applications, platforms, and businesses while interfacing with other technology and business groups. Amazon Seller Services is looking for exceptional Senior Engineers, Technical Project Managers, Software Delivery Managers with strong design, development and leadership background to join its growing team. If you are interested in learning more about these opportunities please contact me at: Eldade@amazon.com
name: Eldad Engelman
title: Sr. Client Lead Recruiter at the Amazon Tempe Development Center
